entry.title: How to label the elements of a bar chart with strings in MATLAB
entry.content:
最近寫matlab時，發現bar()這個function竟然沒有支援輸入參數來更改各個長條圖在x軸底下的label。


而解法如下:


{% codeblock lang:matlab %} bar([1 2 3]); set(gca, 'XTicklabel', {'label1', 'label2', 'label3'}); {% endcodeblock %}


Output Figure:


before: {% img https://dl.dropbox.com/u/37805589/octopress/img/matlab/bar-beforeSet.png %}


after: {% img https://dl.dropbox.com/u/37805589/octopress/img/matlab/bar-afterSet.png %}
